title: Eurovision.Song.Contest.2016.SF1.EBU-FEED.reenc.1080i.AC3-icecub
description:
This is my re-encode of the original EBU feed transport stream posted. Size really doesn't matter! ;) But this is NOT the 1920*1080 original. It's the 1280*1080!

Original feed ts posted by Anonymous as: Eurovision Song Contest 2016: Stockholm (1st SF) [FEED 1080i]

WORDS OF CAUTION WHEN PLAYING BACK!

Media player test/comparison -players used:
- VLC 2.2.1
- MS Media player Ver. 12.07601.19148
- MPC+HC Media Player Classic with CCCP:MPC 64-bit 1.7.8.162/CCCP Raise Your Flag 2015-10-18

Playing back the original feed transport stream:
- MS Media player: There's no image playing the original feed. There is sound, but no picture. File opens in a windows not corresponding with actual size.
- VLC: Severe colour, time jump and image/sound sync issues. Colours are bled out with usually red remaining to some extent. Colour comes and goes. Does not correct sync.
- MPC: Jump issues. Change slider and image is frozen for quite a while. No colour issues and possibly a 1/10 or 1/20 second image/sound sync issue at the end.

Playing back my 1080i re-encode:
- MS Media player: Opens with lesser window size that image size. Severe jump issues with massive artifacts but clears in the end. No colour issues. Severe image/sound sync issues at the end.
- VLC: Same colour issues as with the original. Image/sound sync issues, say, 1/10-1/8 of a second at the end.
- MPC: Jump issues, as in image may adjust with some artifacts, to sync with unchanged sound. No colour issues. No discernible image/sound sync issues at the end.


Media player MPC comparison original with re-encoded file. No difference in image or sound that I can see or hear.

Recommended media player is CCCP package with the Media Player Classic found at http://www.cccp-project.net/

Audio AC3 pass-through and MP3 stereo dropped.
